body.name: Garmin DriveSmart 86 8-inch Bright Crip Glass Screen Car GPS Navigator (010-02471-00) (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 6 hrs 12 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 8” navigator with high-resolution, dual-orientation display and map updates of North America .Special Feature:Large Display; Voice Assist; Hands-Free Calling; Live Traffic and Weather; Traffic Cams and Parking; Smart Notifications,Driver Alerts; Tripadvisor; National Parks Directory; Find Places by Name; Garmin Real Directions Feature.
Hands-free calling when paired with your compatible smartphone with BLUETOOTH technology and convenient Garmin voice assist lets you ask for directions to places you want to go
Road trip–ready features include the HISTORY database of notable sites, a U.S. national parks directory, Tripadvisor traveler ratings and millions of Foursquare POIs
Driver alerts for things such as school zones, sharp curves and speed changes help encourage safer driving and increase situational awareness
Access live traffic, fuel prices, weather, parking and smart notifications when you pair this navigator with your compatible smartphone running the Garmin Drive app

With Alexa Built-in (Drivers should focus on driving and only use this function when safe to do so. Must pair with the Garmin Drive app running on your compatible phone), you can ask to play music, listen to audiobooks, hear the news and more — all while you keep your hands on the wheel and eyes on the road
Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity allows easy map and software updates without a computer
Included dual USB charger provides an extra charging port for phones, tablets or other electronics
body.description: 8” navigator with high-resolution, dual-orientation display and map updates of North America .Special Feature:Large Display; Voice Assist; Hands-Free Calling; Live Traffic and Weather; Traffic Cams and Parking; Smart Notifications,Driver Alerts; Tripadvisor; National Parks Directory; Find Places by Name; Garmin Real Directions Feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and a great value
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the renewed version. There was no screen protector, but the unit looked almost like new. As I recall, there was a slight mark on the back but I don't notice it. I purchased a screen protector and used the GPS to recently drive from AZ to the east coast. No problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice display
reviews.reviewText: Everything works great. Was a little difficult to set up in Bluetooth mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Funciona bien, aveces tarda en agarrar el satélite. Pero luego todo Ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just like google maps, but doesn't show up color light and stop sign as google maps do, 24/7 update receiver, other than that very easy to use, Ok Garmin and Hey Alexa working fine but less voice recognition compare to the Apple Siri voice recognition, A+++ Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very slight learnng curve then works great.
reviews.reviewText: I have mine mounted in the top left corner of my windshield. The bottom of the GPS is higher than the bottom of my sun visor, so there's no interference with seeing ahead.I watched a few youtubes to get familiar with it and then read the downloaded manual. Once I got used to how it worked, and its flexibility, I now use it a lot. It self-adapts to me making a change in route.Everything on it is clear.The suction mount works great on the windshield.I got a like-new refurb and it was literally like new at great savings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big bright responsive screen.
reviews.reviewText: A couple of things that don't work for me. The interior of my new car (Prius) is a type of plastic that this Garmin won't attach to. Also, this larger screen DriveSmart 86, doesn't have larger text than my old DriveSmart 55 which I've decided to keep because I was looking for one that is easier to read. But the screen is big and bright and with a very responsive touch screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need better mounting solution
reviews.reviewText: Works well, but mounting was a pain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cannot adjust brightness using USB interface
reviews.reviewText: If your car only has a USB port, you will not be able to adjust the brightness. It can only be used normally with the cigarette lighter port. It is not friendly to my car.
